title: Colorado Low-income Energy Assistance Program (LEAP)
description: LEAP assists households struggling with heating costs beyond their budget, offering financial support through a federally-funded program. Applications are accepted from November to April, with households needing to meet financial and general guidelines for qualification.

title: Energy Bill Assistance Programs
description: Programs designed to help low-income Coloradans with their energy bills.

title: Energy Outreach
description: Statewide non-profit that raises funds to help low-income Coloradans afford home energy
